name: CAO - Christmas Holiday Releases - MX2 Rabid Reindeer
additionalNotes: It all started with the Angry Santa and the Evil Snowman. Every year, CAO's master blender Rick Rodriguez blends two limited edition cigars to celebrate Christmas. The first release he named Angry Santa based on a story about moving to Alabama when he was a child.Â Christmas Holiday Releases in addition add a flavours line that introduces pumpkin spice to the brand's list of exotic combinations of tobacco and natural essences.
